title: Liberty, Independence, Freedom
lif_is: An eternal declaration store. LIF is a p2p crypto data network that is open, fast and trustable. Owned by no one. Free to all. Today's Internet is controlled by the government and big corporations. LIF aims to stop this dominance.
what_can_i_do_with_lif: What can I do with LIF?
what_can_i_do_with_lif_desc: LIF let you build any application on top of it, such as crypto currency, social apps, online passport, and many more.
lif_advantages_desc: LIF is based on proven 3000 years old technology. When Moses wrote the Torah, he needed a way to ensure the data is never lost or compromised. He used woven declaration scrolls. LIF is using the same principles, together with cutting-edge encryption, p2p and web technologies. Revolutionary fixing the limitations of todayâ€™s Internet and blockchain technologies (eg. Bitcoin).
